name: FRigUnit_TwoBoneIKSimpleVectors
doc:
Solves the two bone IK given positions
Note: This node operates in world space!

Root: The position of the root of the triangle
PoleVector: The position of the pole of the triangle
bEnableStretch: If set to true the stretch feature of the solver will be enabled
StretchStartRatio: The ratio where the stretch starts
BoneALength:
The length of the first bone.
If set to 0.0 it will be determined by the hierarchy
BoneBLength:
The length of the second  bone.
If set to 0.0 it will be determined by the hierarchy
